explains: n. 追求，寻找；继续；追逐，追捕；实行，贯彻；消遣，业余爱好；（自行车赛和滑冰竞赛中的）追逐赛；（生理学）追视
wordGroup: in pursuit of 寻求，追求
in hot pursuit 穷追不舍；紧随其后

sentences.en: The pursuit of money ruled his life.
sentences.cn: 对金钱的追求支配着他的生活。

sentences.en: He was almost maniacal in his pursuit of sporting records.
sentences.cn: 他对打破体育记录的追求是近乎疯狂的。

sentences.en: Relentless in his pursuit of quality, his technical ability was remarkable.
sentences.cn: 由于对质量的坚持不懈的追求，他的技术能力非同凡响。
